content.detailedDescription: Have had over 7 different sightings in this area,all within last 6 years, something strange going on in this area from my evidence i bbelieve.  a lot of abductions happening. you want sightings set up special cameras maybe infrared on lake pontchartrain. after last close sighting 2 days later i was probed by mib in creepy blacked out car even front wondsheid totally black never seen a car like it before creeper me out. i know real truth now. i also know i have been abducted many times. my sightings have been better than any others i have read or heard about.
content.summary: Rggijjjjjhhhgggggggggggggggvvvvvvvv

content.detailedDescription: Estaba en medio del campo en un almacen de gas  trabajando cuando vi un esfera luminosa con dos cazas se diferencia por las luces pequeã±as verde y rojas intermitentes  estaba muy cerca de la esfera tanto los aviones y la luz iban en una  sola dirreccion sobrevolando bajo dirrecion oeste- este cuando se acercaron a horizonnte se apago la luz y los aviones seguian
content.summary: Esfera de luz

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of june 15, 2016 we had just experienced a severe thunderstorm with lots of lightning and rain.  the iss was supposed to be visible in my area at 9:41 pm.  the storm had ended and i went outside with my luna optics night vision camera/recorder... hoping the sky would be clearing and the iss viewable.  the sky was still total overcast, but i turned on my night vision camera (with the infrared light turned on), hoping maybe to see the iss thru the cloud layer.  the clouds were so dense i could not see stars or the iss, but as i moved the monocular camera around, i was surprised to see this bright, oval object in the northern sky.  i would estimate it was maybe 60 degrees above the horizon.  it appeared much larger than points of light i had been used to seeing.  my camera was at 5x magnification, but can zoom to 20x.  even at 5x it seemed to be as large as the moon would be at 1st quarter phase.  i was very excited at what i was seeing.  it hovered in one place, tilted to the right at maybe a 75-80 degree angle.  i tried to get a sharp focus, but due to seeing it thru the clouds, it always appeared a bit fuzzy.  after several minutes it had slowly descended (from my perspective) and was near the top of the trees in my yard.  i was excited to see this, because that proved to me that it was moving in space.  it then ascended back to its original position for maybe one minute, then descended again... this time going so low in the sky that it dipped behind the tree.  i was still able to see it thru the thin branches at the top of the tree... but then it went lower and i lost site of it completely.  i kept searching the sky to see if it would ascend again, but after a few minutes, i quit filming.  in the video, you can see occasional insects darting across the screen.  any time i use the infrared light, insects show up streaking across my view.  as i was observing the object, i tried turning off the infrared light to see if i could see it at all... but nothing was visible unless that light was switched on.  prior to this sighting, all i had seen and captured on video were satellites and planes crossing the night sky.  i went out again last night, hoping to see the glowing disc again, but only saw one satellite.  this whole experience was quite exhilarating.
content.summary: After thunderstorm/lightning glowing disc seen thru clouds with night vision/infrared camera. hovered, descended behind trees- 16 min duration

content.detailedDescription: I first encountered these entities in 1995 briefly in the early summer in okc, (they are small black flying things unlike any "creature" or "animal" or typical walking alien you stereotypically see depicted on tv.  they don't look so concrete, almost as if they have some sort of black holographic cloak surrounding them.  when you look at them, it is like looking into a black void, you can't make it out and it doesn't make sense. i doubt they have wings, as their flight pattern doesn't suggest a wing flap type acceleration, because they are 50 times faster than any bird or land animal on earth. i noticed it first in a hotel bathroom, right before going on my first overseas trip to great britain at the age of 16. they are much smaller than humans, and pinpointing it in the bathroom was very difficult, but i could feel it brush by my shoulders and head. i became violently ill, not sure why.  i managed to make it to gb, a three week long trip away from my mom, and at that point she hadn't seen it and i never spoke of it, but unusual things occurred in gb. time went by, and i blocked it out of my memory, dismissing as some sort of demon because of religious brainwashing i endured growing up. in 2001, i had some mental instability and ended up in a psych unit, where i met a man claiming to be the entity. (20 page chapter in my book, but yes they can inhabit humans 😔) after a big ordeal, the man was released first, and then i was finally released as stable, and mom was there to pick me up. at night, she took me to a hotel, where there was an indoor pool and sauna.  i was the only person at the pool, the hotel itself was practically vacant. the black swarms began again, it would fly close to my head, disappear, reappear, and taunt me to the point where i told my mom i wasn't comfortable staying there.  "your professor said you could sleep on his pull out couch, do you want me to call him?" "yes, please!" she got on the interstate and i could see it flying around the car.  "drive faster, mom, there is something chasing us!!!" "i see it!" "faster, go 85." she dropped me of at professor's, i took my knock out meds and got in bed.  i left a small light on the kitchen. prof's fam was asleep, i got under covers, closed my eyes, and felt something on legs. i opened eyes, and there he was, just sitting on my legs.  i yelled screamed, professor came in turned on lights and saw it.  i looked at prof and yelled  go away. the entity sat on my legs all night, if i yelled it clamped down on my legs, so i stopped yelling. i passed out, woke up at 4 am and it was still there.  by daylight it was gone.  prof was never well after that.  he lost his job and mind and moved into a nursing home at age 53.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Did not see craft, only small black entity sitting on my legs for over 7 hours

content.detailedDescription: At 10:50 pm on june 16, 2016 i was setting outside looking at jupiter and the moon. also looking a the big dipper. i live about 5 miles from lake mead. there were 3 to 5 planes in the area, over the lake. suddenly when i gazed up and looked at the big dipper i notice a dark triangle gliding quickly and silently from east to west towards the planet jupiter. the object had no lights but at each point of the triangle there was a oval shape on the surface. i believe the object was lit by reflected light from las vegas. i had to look twice before i realized i just saw a ufo. my wife just went to work and i called here to tell her about. plus i went to a neighbor and told them. as the object neared the planet jupiter it faded into the dark sky.
content.summary: Saw a silent triangle fly overhead

content.detailedDescription: Sitting out on my front porch right before bed.  i noticed object by sound thinking it was our life light helicopter as it is tourist season which is very typical as you know this happens in an attraction area. i thought it seemed awful early in season to start with life light but then realized there was a helicopter following a very bright white light. also noticed 2 faint "star like" lights far above flying overhead simultaneously. then the bright light disappeared and re-appeared in front of the helicopter. called my son and they witnessed same thing right overhead as they were talking to me on the phone, i could hear the helicopter!   amazing!
content.summary: Helicopter was following brightest light closely. 2 smaller lights much higher flying in sinc with brightest orb/ light

content.detailedDescription: I did not see the ufos. they appeared in  the pictures i took.I can email you the photos.
content.summary: Photos taken from a train in alaska

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to take pictures of approaching storm at 8:02.  pictures dated 6/16/16 8:03pm. a mostly red, slightly orange light, slightly blinking, appeared about nw of my location in front of the approaching storm clouds.  i thought it was an approaching airplane as we have an airport to the north. it, rather abruptly, shot off to my right to the ne until it was about directly north. that took about 2 seconds. then it paused/hovered for a second or two and took off rapidly to the north and was gone in about 5 seconds.
i, unfortunately, did not get a picture or video of it.  by the time i thought i should photograph it, it was gone.  all i have is 2 photos of the approaching storm taken with an 8 mp phone camera.
is it possible that someone with a powerful laser was shining it on the cloud surface to play with the public?
content.summary: Appeared in front of approaching storm cloud in nw.  went at high speed miles ne. stopped. hovered. high speed departure north to horizon out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
After dinner my husband was in the backyard playing with the dog. he yells: i see a ufo, i see a ufo. i come outside but it had gone behind the big trees behind our house. we waited a 2-3 minutes and then we could see again. it was white cigar shape, with left end round and the right end triangle shape ( like a q-tip but bigger ends) it was horizontal. going straight really slow, then stop and hover for a couple minutes, then move again, hover etc.. it appeared to be shapeshifting or morphing and changing shapes. it would appear round, then elongated, the like a triangle. a large jumbo jet flew by the ufo and it appeared slightly bigger than a jet, but i dont know if its because it was closer than the plane, therefore it looked bigger. at one point the triangle shape to the right moved away from the object (maybe 100-200 ft) and disappeared. it was too far away to guess the actual size but it appeared big at least 100 ft long. it looked too big to be a drone or helium balloons. its weird shapeshifting ruled out it being a blimp. it was a windy day but stayed stationary when it stopped to hover. 
it was solid white and changing shape either from rotating and showing different sides or actual morphing. it hard to explain the shape. the sun was behind me and it was not reflecting sunlight on the surface. if i held my arm straight out and compared it to my thumb. it was about 1 inch long using my thumb as a reference. as wide as my thumb. my husband got the binoculars but the ufo was too faraway and a little blurry from the morphing changing shapes to make out more details. no lights. was heading south toward the ohio river and pittsburgh, pa. i watch it for about 10 minutes until it moved south and my view was obscured by more big trees. i live about 10 blocks 1 mile from the confluence of the ohio river and beaver river. another time, we were walking the dog near a small sandy beach on the ohio river and a big orange glowing soccor ball size meteor or ufo flew over our heads and went in the river. i keep looking outside for it in case it comes back.
content.summary: White ufo appeared to be shapeshifting or morphing/rotating and changing shape.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
 - in my backyard - facing north.

2. what made you first notice the object?
 - it was a single light int he sky and it was moving twoards me without any blinking lights.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 - i really didn't know what to think, as it didn't have the characteristics of a plane.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
 - once i noticed the single point of light, i took out my lg g3 smartphone and began filming.  as it approached my location it wasn't getting any bigger, and for the whole time i viewed and filmed, i did not notice any strobes or blinking beacons, thus, i concluded it wasn't a commercial plane.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
 - i was excited, considering i normally don't get to record with this phone at night - not very good.  the clarity was good and it really gave me a moment to look closely at the object.  once i did, and zoomed my camera in on the object, i noticed it was spherical and that the edges were all "fuzzy".  very odd.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
 - as it travelled south - it eventually went over my neighbors house and i was unable to continue viewing.  imo - the "dog head fire" was active, and this object seemed to be heading straight towards that region - southeast of albuquerque, nm.
content.summary: In my backyard and looking north when i noticed a single white light (orb) approaching my location.  it was not moving fast, nor did it have any visible airplane beacons or strobes blinking.

content.detailedDescription: It was almost 2 pm and my wife and i were going to starbucks for a glass of tea, when a car backed out in front of us.  i stopped to let it out and when it was driving by us i instantly turned to my wife and asked did you see that and she said they had no face, and i agreed.  it looked like a female driver but there was no face on the head driving the car.  i mean it was about the color of cardboard, but there was no mouth eye's or nose.  there was no features at all.
content.summary: This thing was driving a car

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep in my bed about 4:00 am after going to sleep late (maybe midnight), i awoke in sleep paralysis coupled with shooting pain in my head and neck, at first i felt like my head was in the jaws of some large animal, like a puma. the pain was intense across the crown of my head and back of neck, as if something were forcing my spine to be straight while i was being held by a device. i broke free from this device after feeling two injections, one into my spine which left serious pain and the other behind my lower left ear on my neck (offset from the spine), which left me feeling drained. i mustered enough willpower to wrench myself free from the vice grip and turned to see an entity with black skin and speckled all over with silver (the entity was at least 6-8 feet tall, but was hunched over so height was not easily determinable, it felt larger than me and left a predatory aura of menace)- its eyes were speckled with silver swirls, reminding me of a chameleon's lidded eyes but conveyed the impression of swirling galaxies. the black skinned entity had long arms with an extra joint between the wrist and hand area. the entity made a loud noise as if surprised that i had wrenched free from the vice or device it had used on me, the sound was a deep throated noise that was similar to "urrruck". it didn't seem to be telepathic communication or anything, just a loud noise it made. then it suddenly seemed to grow hazy and vanish. by this point i was fully awake and terrified. i felt a terrible menace in my darkened house, with only a faint kitchen light. i felt or somehow knew, the entity was still here, waiting for my body to grow tired and me to fall asleep again. i forced myself out of bed and began searching my house, flipping on lights in every room as i did so. i found my kitchen and bedroom/bathroom empty. i still felt pain from my back, shoulder, neck and head that persisted. fueled mostly by adrenaline i entered my sitting room and suddenly felt a spot of cold behind my couch and my hairs all stood on end. i began to check the entryway door to my house and suddenly i heard the sound of both my backdoor and my front door slamming loudly and simultaneously. i opened the door fast to see if i could catch someone or something running away, but found that my front door was locked. i ran immediately to the back door and discovered the same thing. i don't know if this was due to some sort of temporal anamoly or an ability to pass through solid matter, but i was fully awake and very terrified by that point. i went out the back door and looked up into the sky, the stars were out and light cloud cover, with clouds racing on the wind. only one cloud was not moving and it had a round hole in the cloud cover - nothing seemed to be there but it was perfectly circular. i couldn't say how high up above the house it was, but it seemed close (<100<500yards). i went back inside after giving the sky the middle finger and returned to my house. i didn't know what to do but i wouldn't get back to sleep until 10am, i looked at myself in mirror and found a mark on the back of my neck under my left ear where i felt the second injection. i photographed this injection mark (although possibly it could have been a bug bite, although it was not there when i went to sleep) with my cellphone and the next day i would find a second mark (unphotographed) on the back of my neck right below the skull, right on my spine. the event was menacing and predatory and unlike any other encounter i've had. i periodically document my encounters during sleep paralysis when i seem to encounter entities, although this event was far more extreme and persisted long after i was fully awake. the entity encountered was unlike anything i've ever seen before or heard of as well.
content.summary: Encounter with a black skinned entity following sleep paralysis and injection of unknown device

content.detailedDescription:
I used the night vision of the first generation with a two fold increase for observation.
objects seen in the form of luminous dots, no sound was heard.

initially, about 0:30, i noticed a flying object from north to south, and then next to the first object, the second object was seen flying from south to north.

the third object was seen at 1:12 he was flying from south to north.
content.summary: Observation of three ufos at night

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving north on south lamar and ben white in austin, tx.  
2.  it was coming straight at me on the road and i thought yikes!
3. at first i thought maybe it was a helicopter until it got closer and plainly resembled a ufo video i saw on a documentary.  
4. clear sky, bright sunny day, saturn shaped silver reflective object about 15,000 ft. above heading right at me.  it suddenly made almost  right angle turn and climbed at about a 60 degree angle to about 35,000 ft. in a few secs.  i say this based on observing from ground long distance commercial jets flying at about 35k ft. cross country.  object would therefore have been about the size of a boeing 757.  after traveling to what i estimate about 30 miles away, it abruptly turned around and headed back toward me then stopped and vanished almost instantly in the opposite direction.  its orbit to the west resembled that of any angry bee or a diagram of multiple orbits around an atom. 
5.  i was excited because i had witnessed first hand something i had previously only read about or viewed in footage taken by others and included in documentaries.
6.  i pulled into a parking lot to try to get a better look and possibly get a photo with my cell phone but the object sped off to the west with lightning speed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Changed directions rapidly, flight resembled an angry bee, went from about 15k ft. to about 35k in 2 sec

content.detailedDescription: I was at vanderveer park sitting on the top of the fountain looking up at the stars with 2 of my friends then all of the sudden i noticed 3 bright star looking things i thought they were stars at first but they were to bright to be stars i watched it sit in one spot for about 1 min they it started moving and dimming it got a bit faster then just dissapeard.The same thing happend within minutes of the first one then minutes after that it had happened again.When i looked at it sitting there it made me feel scared i just stared at it i didn't know what to do only one of my friends had seen it and she only seen one of them.Now today on the 16th of june i was laying on my recliner at about 1:20 with my eyes closed then all of the sudden i couldn't move or scream i really wanted to but i couldn't. my head was intensely vibrating and ringing and it kinda hurt. along with the sounds i saw a picture of a submarine sitting at the bottom of the sea it wasn't rotted at all then it just got very bright and everything was white and i began to get flashes of a series of 3 or 4 pictures i saw one that looked like a chart but i'm not really sure i couldn't really make out what it was.Then another that i saw what had looked like an alien.It had an elongated head long chin and huge eyes.I was only able to see the face,the third picture was a nuclear sign.The vibrating and sounds stopped for a second but then it started again with the same pictures it went on for a bit and then it was gone slowly i began to regain my ability to see,move,and talk then my body began to tingle started from my legs up that went away away quickly.In my opinion i think the weirdest thing about this is that my dad and mom were in the room. now my head is pounding and i have something like a headache but it's more in the middle of my head and on my temples. i'm am not 18 yrs or older and neither were my friends but i just don't understand the pictures or anything.
content.summary: They were very bright and big at first and they moved slow as if to look for something but then got smaller and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i wanted to take a pic of our adventure and tree line before the sunlight was completely gone. we set up the pic and i wanted to get the "star" in it. i remember it moving at the time and thought it was a plane.

while reviewing the photos, i noticed the star was weird looking and zoomed in. definitely not a star. not sure exactly what it is. i have a series of six photo's with the first and last being used for time and direction keeping. they are just seconds apart. i did notice that the last photo, the object is more clear and bigger, so i'm assuming it was advancing towards us from the northeast.
content.summary: Thought it was a plane but when zoomed in, it really doesn't look like a plane

content.detailedDescription: Before my teenager years my step sister,step mom and step sisters cousin all seen this,any long term effects?Well i see clearly the correlations between placebo effects,miracle healings,healin g meditation,healing hypnosis and prayer.For example,have you ever prayed for stuff and you still haven't got that new car?What if i told you that the mechanics of prayer work like programming a computer..Try praying for your own self healing and longevity and watch yourself change..Pass this down your blood line and someday mankind will live hundreds of years genetically. []
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle close enough to hit with a rock if i would have tried

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work when i look up in the sky and about a mile ahead of me, slightly to my left was a silver bright object. i was slowing down and tried to get a better look at it. we have no planes that fly over us and have very many crop fields. as i was driving trees blocked my view. as my view became unblocked the object was gone. no where to be seen. i look all around the sky for it and couldn't find it. i wasn't a dim light it was quite bright and noticeable.
content.summary: Tracking bright object, went around some trees to get a better look and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a star or planet to the northeast just before sunset. got telescope and at first thought it was saturn but it was in the wrong location. upon further viewing noticed it looked like a parachute or jellyfish reflecting sunlight. it may have produced it's own light but i think it was the setting sun reflecting. it seemed to be very high and a long distance away. it didn't seem to move just hover. you could see the detail very well with the telescope but the pictures i took using a dslr and the scope for a lens aren't that great. i hope someone can enlarge them without the distortion. the object remained in the same general area , i only lost sight of it because of clouds that moved in. it was in view for at least an hour from the time i noticed it. it appeared to be 30,000 feet or higher.
content.summary: Witnessed thru telescope.Looked like parachute or jellyfish. star w/naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch when i noticed a prism forming at a particularly dirty plane contrail.  i thought the prism effect was rare as i have never observed anything similar so i took out my phone and started taking photos of it.  the weather was extremely calm with almost no wind so i was able to observe the effect as it slowly moved across the sky.  i took a series of photos on the front porch at both standard and 4x zoom.  when the effect went behind the tree line and out of my sight from the front porch, i proceeded to my 3rd floor bedroom window and snapped two more pictures of the now dissipating effect.  when i later observed the photos i saw something that appeared in only one of the photos.  after searching the other photos i saw what seemed to be the same object at a further distance on a later photo.  three minutes past between the first and second photo containing the object in question.  the airspace is a busy traffic lane for northeast philadelphia and philly international airports.
content.summary: Object appears 2 times in a series of photos taken of a contrail prism

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a precise point of intense green light, similar to color of 532nm wavelength, stationary, then abrupt lateral and descending, pause, then abrupt ascent, then lateral, pause, descent, then fading off. immediately prior to observed abrupt and precise movements, my 28-year old son answered my yells to summon him to witness this event. we both soon observed the stationary, silent, intensely bright object commence its several extraordinary and abrupt movements, up until it simply faded into oblivion (disappeared). neither of us could liken the light color, or intensity to anything known to the public, et.Al. neither could we liken the approximate 532nm wavelength (green) light to any commonly known sources, i.E. known aircraft, traffic lights, remote controlled hobbyists' flying crafts, nor leds, nor green lasers. even if one were to argue that we misidentified any object, or light sources, then they would need to explain the object's silence at such close proximity to us, as well as, explain the object's precise and abrupt spatial movements and stops.

i studied astronomy, so am competent and capable of ruling out all stars and planets, as well as, every and all known meteorological types of events.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Precise point of intense green light, similar to color of 532nm wavelength, stationary, then abrupt lateral and descending, pause, then abrupt ascent, then lateral, pause, descent, then fading off.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on our deck we were looking at a rainbow appearing to the right of a mountain - as we were looking at the rainbow another rainbow appeared but the second rainbow was a pink curved line - told my husband to take a picture with his iphone as it seemed unusual to see two rainbows side by side but the second appearing one was just a thick pink arc - we got a picture of the rainbows - then suddenly an object appeared to the left of the pink arc and we both thought oh a bird but then we realized it wasn't a bird although it seemed to 'flow' up and down soaring and changing direction randomly turning and circling - then another object appeared very quickly and then quickly disappeared - but i could see it - just very quick flashes - then i told my husband to quickly take another picture and as he tried to do so the object that was more visible disappeared - as soon as he lowered his phone the object reappeared. this happened a few times in quick order. so we saw one object first - my husband couldn't see the second - the whole experience lasted about 2 minutes - it was metallic looking shape shifted - had a pinkish red light which looked like an appendage but it's hard to describe because the shape kept changing. it appeared in the ne hovered - spiraled moved quickly left to right - moved in a circle - changed direction again towards the right and headed n - shifted back to the ne again then n and then just disappeared.  we wanted to get a picture but couldn't.  didn't feel anything. we just moved back to this location a few weeks ago from another state. quite unexpected and its was still light outside.  definitely unusual - odd.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 shiny objects close to each other - appeared in front of a rainbow shape shifting one disappeared the other hovered turned very quickly back and forth intermittently disappeared reappeared all very quick

content.detailedDescription: This object had been seen by a friend of mine in the area around the same time 2 separate nights so a few of us got together to investigate. at first we saw a few planes but they were always to high and the light pattern was wrong and the wrong color. 11:30 rolled by and we saw dim white lights moving rather slow toward us. it was above tree level, about the height of the towns water tower and flew right over us. there were 4 dim white lights all on the tips of a diamond shaped craft that appeared to be about the size width wise of a house. the craft was solid black outline and was silent until it was right over us. then we could hear a deep but soft whine. like a distant plane but it came from right above us. there was no downdraft of apparent propulsion anywhere we could see and then it picked up speed away from us. we believe the pilots noticed they were being watched and have since changed their flight path because we haven't seen it in the same place again. we tried to follow in our cars but it was moving faster than we could follow. my radio presets were all erased when i started my truck, my watch was acting strange and my walkie talkies died with over half battery left. we wrote everything down and drew what we saw and later had trouble recalling exactly what happened.
content.summary: Diamond shaped with white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting in my back yard about 10:30 p.M. on june 15, 2016 when i looked up and saw a white light moving south, south-east. it looked like a plane except the light did not flash or pulsate and there were no colors. it moved faster than a normal plane but maybe as fast as a fighter jet. after moving in a straight line at a steady speed for about 20 seconds it faded out within the next 4 seconds, becoming unperceivable against the night sky.

 it could have been a military jet at high altitude burning its afterburners for a short duration but there was no sound and no light after it faded.

 also, i don't know how long it was illuminated before i noticed it.

 the sun had set not long ago and the object was slightly in the western sky, so it might have been the sun reflecting off the bottom of a satellite until it reached a sharp enough angle to go dark.

 i don't know what it was, but planes don't fade out unless they change directions. and, it didn't have extreme movements like is mentioned in typical ufo reports.

 i watched the video of the lights seen by the group on june 4, 2016 in the arizona desert and it looked very much like that. i have seen a similar light about a year ago in the same area, but thought it was either a satellite or a slow moving meteor that burned out. since i watched the video of the recent arizona incident, i thought i might mention it to mufon. it didn't seem extremely unnatural or man-made, so i wouldn't be surprised if it was something unremarkable.

 thank you and please let me know what you think.
content.summary: Star-like object moving like a fast jet south south-east about 20 seconds then slowly faded out.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the stars when suddenly i saw 2 lights flying in the night sky. at first i thought them to be planes but there were no flashing lights as usual planes had as well as they were flying too slow for planes. as i watched i noticed they would dart from side to side very suddenly, sometimes even stopping in mid air then going again and even shooting ahead a few feet then slowing right down. also they were able to turn at a perfect 90° turn suddenly. i tried to get video on my phone but it would not record. eventually they just flew out of sight and i came inside. but i was perfectly calm and at the same time excited.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was watching stars and saw 2 white lights flying. thought they were planes at first but to slow for planes. moved from side to side and able tp stop then go again

content.detailedDescription: My son age 35 was taking his nightly bike ride, while looking up at an airplane, he noticed lights moving across the sky.   he came running inside and told me and his grandma that he just saw 2 moving stars, come and look!!  so his grandma and i went outside and looked up into the sky where he had spotted them.  to my amazement, there wasn't just 2 moving stars.   over a 30 minute period, the 3 of us watched 5 moving star-like objects move across the night sky. after several minutes had gone by some of them flew out of our field of vision, others just blinked out.  these were clearly not airplanes or helicopters. they had multiple lights in a spherical shape.  this isn't the first time we've seen unidentified flying objects in our area. we were all 3 amazed at our sightings tonight, and discussed it at great length. we are convinced that, we are not alone!
content.summary: Observered several starlike objects moving across the sky!

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were driving home during a bad thunderstorm when we noticed a ball of light in the sky. it was very bright and only lasted maybe a minute, shorty disappearing.
content.summary: Ball of light during thunderstorm

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I walk outside my mom's apartment and was getting some air and i looked up at the sky and saw a orange red and lights the sky was cloudy and i had to wait for the clouds to pass over before i could get some pics and u can see in the pics the lights and shape.
content.summary: Saucer shaped then triangle shaped at times and lights that go around it diff colors

content.detailedDescription: Early morning just before the sun rose i observed a light that looked similar to a commercial passenger plane with it's landing light on over the western horizon. the object seemed to hover or appear as a commercial passenger plane does as it approaches for landing; for several moments before dimming to a star like brightness. the object started to ascend into the sky. it traveled on an upward path slowly for only a few seconds before shooting straight up as fast as a bullet. it then appeared to travel straight into space as the object did not traverse the atmosphere as an aircraft at very high altitude would. the sky was still dark enough to make out stars in constellations. seeing the object shoot out of sight into orbit as fast as it did i followed it with my eye till i could not see it any more. i've grown up seeing many shuttle and rocket launches to know that this was not a conventional aerial object but something unexplainable in terms of modern known crafts.
content.summary: Bright light seen in western sky early morning

content.detailedDescription:
Doing yard work when i noticed the first object passing over.Approx. time was 3:15 pm. i was in the shadow of my roof line and thought that is a strange shiny object . don't remember why i initially looked up . it passed by in a nw to se direction. i watched it travel at a good clip over the tree line to my left. sky was crystal clear and just a slight breeze. about one minute after another traveled the identical route. i observed more closely. each one  passed over pretty evenly spaced by about 1-2 min. between. as the sixth one passed over my son  drove up the driveway and i insisted he watch for just one minute. he was in a hurry but did so anyway. he also saw one pass over and dismissed it as a mylar balloon.
to me this didn't look at all like balloons and it was pretty creepy. they appeared to be small craft of some kind. seeing i had already seen so many i ran into the house and grabbed my camera. cannon power shot. it' not so great for videos and does a pretty poor job of zooming so i set it on infinity as they were so small and pretty far away. first tried two short clips of video . one is about 10 sec. the second about 5. took four pics and the battery died. they were still coming one at a time consistently spaced so i grabbed my telescope from the basement pulled it outside and realized the eyepiece was missing. ran in to the house brought the computer online , called nuforc and they advised me to take careful notes. called my wife because i couldn't find the binoculars - found them and ran back outside with scrap paper , pen and binocs. i managed to focus on 3 or 4 still about one or two min. apart and the sun was reflecting off of them brightly to begin with and they appeared to have a small dome on top. as they traveled to my left the suns reflection wasn't as strong and was able to not only see a small dome  but a faint red orange ring at the base of the dome. the shape overall was a fat disc or squashed basketball with the dome on top. the final one i saw was at 4:03 pm and it passed over a small single engine plane . i have to guess that the plane was about 600 to 800 ft. and the object in question was another 2 hundred feet higher. as it passed over the plane it curved more towards the sw instead of se. i was a little relieved because i  was able to get more perspective for my depth perception. the final orb traveled n to s then took a slight hook to the e. this was so fascinating , exciting and confusing to watch unfold. i saw an approx. total of 25 . i have in my notes 4:05 was the last one. i do regret talking to others about this already and am glad this can remain anonymous.
content.summary: Observed small discs/orbs passing over rooftop 1-2 min. apart for approx. 50 min. all taking the same path nw to se . the final one passed over a single engine plane . plane leaving airport alt. aprox. 5-800 ft. object passed about 200ft . above it's wing
